body.p: Like SIC‑8, IFRS 1 requires retrospective application in most areas. Unlike SIC‑8, it:

li.p: includes targeted exemptions to avoid costs that would be likely to exceed the benefits to users of financial statements, and a small number of other exceptions for practical reasons.
clarifies that an entity applies the latest version of IFRSs.
clarifies how a first‑time adopter’s estimates in accordance with IFRSs relate to the estimates it made for the same date in accordance with previous GAAP.
specifies that the transitional provisions in other IFRSs do not apply to a first‑time adopter.
requires enhanced disclosure about the transition to IFRSs.
